pullRequest.title: (CDAP-16353) Refactoring: move artifact http internal endpoints to a separate handler
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move 2 artifact http internal endpoints (e.g. ../artifact-internals/...) to a separate internal http handler.
This is in preparation of introducing more internal endpoint for fetching artifact details,
which is needed by preview to run with local levelDB.
(this is re-sending out an earlier PR that was discarded due to me messing up the change when resolving conflicts)

(CDAP-16353) Refactoring: move artifact http internal endpoints to a separate handler

which is needed by preview to run with local levelDB.
